channel.title: Facebook on Welcome to My Site!
channel.description: Recent content in Facebook on Welcome to My Site!

item.title: What it's like a year after quitting Facebook
item.description: Just under a year ago, I quit Facebook. Yup. After a decade of using it frequently, with over 10,000 posts and 7,000 pictures. It was the best decision I made. The original premise of Facebook has always appealed to me: connect with others you know in real life, but online, in order to share pictures and information to keep current. But it also has a lot of negatives: It often becomes your main method of communication to others.
